input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: DNSAdapter.

looks up for DNS record in DNSAdapter. Supported DNS Records is A, PTR. <items> <item> <target> <command-file-location>/tmp</command-file-location> <secret-key-location>/etc/ddns-update.key</secret-key-location> <dns-zone>dnsbind.com</dns-zone> <dns-server>10.129.54.94</dns-server> <reverse-dns-server>10.129.54.94</reverse-dns-server> <reverse-dns-zone>54.129.10.in-addr.arpa</reverse-dns-zone> <reverse-dns-secret-key-location>/etc/ddns-update.key</reverse-dns-secret-key-location> </target> <parameters> <host-name>dim</host-name> <ip-address>10.129.54.112</ip-address> <reverse-ip-address>112.54.129.10</reverse-ip-address> </parameters> </item> </items>
sample item.xml for type A record:
<items> <item> <target> <command-file-location>/tmp</command-file-location> <secret-key-location>/etc/ddns-update.key</secret-key-location> <dns-zone>dnsbind.com</dns-zone> <dns-server>10.129.54.94</dns-server> <reverse-dns-secret-key-location>/etc/ddns-update.key</reverse-dns-secret-key-location> </target> <parameters> <host-name>dim</host-name> <ip-address>10.129.54.112</ip-address> </parameters> </item> </items>
Details of attributes:
Command File Location:<command-file-location> Specifies a valid directory location on the BAO server This location is used to create the files, which are used to run the commands. Required: No
Secret Key Location:<secret-key-location> Specifies the location where the secret key which is used to connect to the DNS server is located Required: No
DNS Zone:<dns-zone> Specifies the DNS zone for DNS server forlook up Required: No
Reverse DNS Zone:<reverse-dns-zone> Specifies the DNS zone for look up Required: No
DNS Server: <dns-server> Specifies the host name or IP address of the DNS server look up Required: No
Reverse DNS Server:<reverse-dns-server> Specifies the host name or IP address of the DNS server forlook up Required: No
ip-address: Specifies the IP address to to be looked up.
Required :Yes
Hostname
The hostname of machine for which operation need to be looked up
Required :Yes

output.description: Returned adapter response is captured in this context parameter.

documentation.description: Delete a DNS Record of type A,PTR,SRV,CNAME,TXT and MX from InfoBlox Grid Manager.
